title: The Last Guest
premise: A seemingly perfect couple, Leo and Mara, run an exclusive lakeside retreat for the wealthy and burned-out. Their newest guest is a reclusive tech billionaire who pays a fortune for absolute anonymity. But when Leo recognizes him as the man who ruined his former life under a different name, he initiates a long-planned revenge—only to discover Mara has been secretly working with the guest all along, and he's the real mark in their con.
protagonist: Leo Vance, a former forensic accountant posing as a serene hospitality expert, whose meticulous revenge plan is about to be turned against him.
conflict: Leo must survive the weekend and outmaneuver his own wife and their powerful guest, unraveling a deeper conspiracy about his past while trapped in the isolated luxury property he designed to be a perfect trap for others.
setting: Present-day, an ultra-modern, architecturally stunning retreat on a remote Canadian lake, accessible only by boat or seaplane.
tone: Claustrophobic, sleek, and psychologically tense, blending the curated perfection of a luxury getaway with the rising panic of a snare tightening.
